name: py-htgettoken

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
htgettoken gets OIDC authentication tokens for High Throughput Computing
via a Hashicorp vault server.

Python-GSSAPI provides both low-level and high level wrappers around the
GSSAPI C libraries.

A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
